body_html:
There's some performance hit for not using masked_select 394us -> 638us:

https://gist.github.com/colesbury/de7193e8dd6ef92b4011a0c4c512096f

We could probably use masked_select for the one ByteTensor case. It's just a little tricky to make sure the output has the correct shape

body:
There's some performance hit for not using `masked_select` 394us -> 638us:

https://gist.github.com/colesbury/de7193e8dd6ef92b4011a0c4c512096f

We could probably use `masked_select` for the one `ByteTensor` case. It's just a little tricky to make sure the output has the correct shape
